SimpleResponse GetMiniGameUserData (string accountId, string miniGameId, string miniGameName, string dataKey, string dataKeyCsvList)
SimpleResponse SaveMiniGameUserData (string accountId, string miniGameId, string miniGameName, string dataKey, string dataValue)
 Use To store a single key/value pair per user you wish to update again and again or only once This creates a unique relationship between an ACCOUNT, MINIGAME, and DATAKEY .. saving it's value and then overwriting the value on each following save.

Use To store a single key/value pair per user you wish to update again and again or only once This creates a unique relationship between an ACCOUNT, MINIGAME, and DATAKEY .. saving it's value and then overwriting the value on each following save.
